Accessibility

Mouse 2D

Two fuschia squares on a grey background. As the user’s mouse moves left, the squares rotate around each other in the left direction and vice versa as the user’s mouse moves right

Moving the mouse changes the position and size of each box.

function setup() {
  createCanvas(720, 400);
  noStroke();
  rectMode(CENTER);
}

function draw() {
  background(230);
  fill(244, 122, 158);
  rect(mouseX, height / 2, mouseY / 2 + 10, mouseY / 2 + 10);
  fill(237, 34, 93);
  let inverseX = width - mouseX;
  let inverseY = height - mouseY;
  rect(inverseX, height / 2, inverseY / 2 + 10, inverseY / 2 + 10);
}
